nodes.text: Star Wars Insider 56 is the fifty-sixth issue of Star Wars Insider magazine. It was released to newsstands on October 2, 2001. Issue 56 was the last produced by Christopher Perkins, who had taken over as Star Wars Insider's chief editor with issue 55. This issue featured a reverse flip cover on the back of the magazine with related content focusing on filmmaker Kevin Smith, known for his role in the character duo Jay and Silent Bob.
